Our Books

Explore the powerful resources, insights, and stories shaping the future of inclusive education through the #MyDearTeacher Movement.

1. Neurodiverse Classrooms

Subtitle: A Teacherâ€™s Guide to SEN Support (Practical Strategies for Every Student)

A go-to guide filled with practical tools and strategies for supporting neurodiverse learners. This book equips educators to confidently serve students with special educational needs in mainstream classrooms.

2. Beyond Gifted

Subtitle: Supporting Talented and Twice-Exceptional Learners in Our Neurodiverse World

This groundbreaking book bridges the gap between gifted education and neurodiversity. It empowers schools and families to recognize, support, and celebrate 2e learnersâ€”those who are both gifted and challenged.

3. Dear Teacher, I Am Not Broken

A poetic, heart-opening narrative that gives voice to misunderstood learners. This book sparked the global #MyDearTeacher movement and continues to inspire inclusive education worldwide.

4. #MyDearTeacher Toolkit

Subtitle: Advocacy & Resource Guide for Inclusive Classrooms

A practical toolkit filled with checklists, templates, conversation starters, and inclusion frameworks for teachers, schools, and advocacy partners.
